manifest.name: redent
manifest.description: Strip redundant indentation and indent the string
manifest.readme:
# redent [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/redent.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/sindresorhus/redent) > [Strip redundant indentation](https://github.com/sindresorhus/strip-indent) and [indent the string](https://github.com/sindresorhus/indent-string) ## Install ``` $ npm install --save redent ``` ## Usage ```js const redent = require('redent'); redent('\n foo\n bar\n', 1); //=> '\n foo\n bar\n' ``` ## API ### redent(input, [count], [indent]) #### input Type: `string` #### count Type: `number`
Default: `0` How many times you want `indent` repeated. #### indent Type: `string`
Default: `' '` String to use for the indent. ## License MIT Â© [Sindre Sorhus](https://sindresorhus.com)
